name: Frenisator's lair
description:
Welcom to frenisator's lair !!

This game is just a little 2D platforming game where you can use your graplin with your mouse and use the scroll wheel to switch between dimensions !

Sorry in advance for the difficulty and enjoy the final boss, the great Frenisator, teacher of unity game engine !

(also sorry for musics, it's all Hollow knight OST, this game was at first a simple student project)
